name: The Greatest Magic
description:
You only have One Shot, a chance to launch the greatest magic and destroy everything... hopefully without destroying yourself!

Made by 

ekaperiodictable11 (me) and Jasonnautilus (https://jasonnautilus.itch.io/)

Controls:
WASD keys to move.
Left Mouse Button to start casting. Press again to fire.

Press esc to reset the level
